# [Interview #1097: Orem Signing Report - Zas678, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1097#4)

#### Question

Can Parshendi receive a Boon and a Curse?

#### Brandon Sanderson (Paraphrased)

Yes they can.
